text: warslna rusulana qad qasasnahum ealayk fi alquran min qibal hadhih alayt, warusulana lam naqsushum ealayk lhkmt ardnaha. wakalam allah musaa tklymana; tshryfana lah bhdhh alsf. wafi hadhih alayat alkrymt, 'iithbat sifat alkalam lilah -teala- kama ylyq bjlalh, wa'anah subhanah klm nabih musaa -elyh alslam- hqyqt bila wsatt
